name: ECOMI
public_notice: ECOMI (OMI) has recently migrated from their old contract on GoChain to a new ERC20 contract. For more information, please view this announcement on Medium.

description.en: ECOMI’s mission is to create the world’s best platform to purchase, protect and collect premium licensed digital collectibles using Distributed Ledger Technology.
